charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment for 12 months and 1 day; 3 year term of supervised release with the following conditions submit to search, participate in correctional treatment program for drugs/alcohol, complete 100 hours unpaid community service, dft to remain in treatment program"The Effort"until surrender; sentence stayed to 11/6/95 at 2:00pm; dft to surrender to USM or designated institution; $100 penalty assessment (1)
